nodes.text: A clone naval officer served in the bridge crew of Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi's flagship, the Negotiator, around 20 BBY during the Clone Wars.

When General Grievous attacked Obi-Wan Kenobi's fleet, the clone naval officer informed Kenobi that Grievous was bringing a boarding party aboard the Negotiator. The officer was later killed when Grievous and his battle droids took control of the bridge.
